attributes.action: Make child alienation from another parent a crime
attributes.additional_details:
When parents divorce, its hard enough for children to cope with their new life. Too many parents alienate, groom and condition their children to hate and ultimately cease contact with their mother or father. For the child, this has long lasting and far reaching psychological consequences and impacts on their education and mental health. For parents, its devastating, lives are ruined and relationships between children and their parents destroyed. 

This should be a crime for those responsible.
attributes.background: Make the alienation of children from a parent a criminal offence.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615816
